summary: This very simple mod modifies the Silent moons enchant.
descriptionHtml:
This very simple mod modifies the Silent moons enchant :

- Fixed Silent moons enchant vanilla bug (this fix is included in Unofficial Skyrim Patch 1.0+)
- Changed Silent moons enchant's property to "While the moons are out, absorb <mag> points of health."
- Changed visual effect to red
- Greater magnitude than the vanilla absorb health effect

When striking, the effect is the same as vampire's absorb health spell. Those changes were made to better fit with vampire characters.

(Description corrected by aemaethcold. Thanks a lot!)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Changelog]

V1.1 -  Fixed taper duration
　　　　　Modified base cost that was too low

Sorry, I'm poor at English. Therefore, I may not be able to support well.
author: nt6486
